title: Welding Farming Equipment - NEW UNKNOWN TILLER + Kubota L2502

tasks.task: Performing Welding Repair on Farm Equipment make sense? Since it's very specific to agriculture (welding farm equipment), maybe it's okay. Let's see the subtasks.

inspecting the crack, removing old welds, doing better weld, handling gas outage, and painting. These are all steps in repairing equipment. Is that too specialized? The person isn't planting or harvesting; they are dealing with machinery. So it's relevant to the broader category of agriculture, which includes maintaining farm equipment. I think this is acceptable.
Therefore, the MAINTASK and its subtasks should be included.
Performing Welding Repair on Farm Equipment
subtasks: Preparing for painting and future repairs
